title: Hikari to Mizu no Daphne Specials
opening_song: "Asu no Blue Wing" (明日の Blue wing) by Sae
ending_song: #1: "Anata to Iu Toki" (あなたと言う時間) by CooRie (eps 1-16, 25)
sinopse: Two bonus episodes that take place during the course of the series, approximately halfway through it seems. They are entitled 'Everything you always wanted to know about Nereids (but were afraid to ask)' and 'Heaven can wait for Maia Mizuki'. These stories are more lighthearted and comedic in tone, bordering on silly.
